page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: The Knighton area has recreation and sport for all.It has a nine hole{Golf {Course }on an elevated position above the town.The {Football,Cricket and {Crochet teams}play at Bryn-y-Castell. The football team plays in the { {Central Wales League}and the{Mid Wales {League}and the cricket team in the {Herefordshire League.}The{Swimming {Pool}is situated on the Primary School Campus.The{Bowling Green}is in Church Road and both ladies and men play in the Mid Wales Leagues in summer and indoors in the Community Centre in winter.The{Tref-y-Clawdd Rugby Team play on the outskirts of the town. There are clubs for{hockey,badminton, {fishing,table tennis,tennis and {swimming.}Many games such as{ {darts,pool,snooker and cribbage}are played during the winter months in local inns.
